Description:
Plan, coordinate, and monitor the shipping process to ensure timely and accurate delivery of productsoptimizing efficiency, reduce clearance costs, and freight rates.Stay updated on local laws, regulations, and best practices related to shipping and logistics, and makerecommendations for process improvements.Oversee the shipments and costs and ensuring that timeliness and productivity are maintained.
Develop all commercial invoices and packing lists associated with the initial bill.
Ensure all shipment and inventory-related issues are addressed and resolved at the earliest.Skills
Skills:
Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
In-depth knowledge of all legal regulations and customs regulations.
Must have excellent organizational and management skills.
Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Ability to adapt and work under pressure Knowledge of Industry standards and local Market trends
Problem Solving skills
